short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help users manage out of control tab usage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help users manage out of control tab usage. You can choose the the timeframe for which any tabs you have not interacted with for that specified time will be closed. The current tab is never closed.
